mapper.select: select count(user_id) from questionnaire where user_id = #{userId}
select record_time as recordTime from questionnaire where user_id = #{userId}
select coalesce(origin_assets, 0) as originAssets from questionnaire where user_id = #{userId}
select invest_prefer from recommend where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire(user_id, funds, saving, insurance, stocks, gold, bond, answer, record_time, origin_assets) values(#{userId}, #{funds}, #{saving}, #{insurance}, #{stocks}, #{gold}, #{bond}, #{answer}, #{recordTime}, #{originAssets})
